plot: A girl is cursed with visions of how people will die. Her solitary life changes when she sees her own death.
title: The Pencil and the Curse
plot_es: A girl is cursed with visions of how people will die. Her solitary life changes when she sees her own death.
plot_en: A girl is cursed with visions of how people will die. Her solitary life changes when she sees her own death.
